full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer for Sealing Tapes - Canada Border Services Agency
==============================================

## Request for Standing Offer
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites submissions for a Standing Offer for the supply, packaging, and delivery of sealing tapes entitled “Sealing Tapes – Opened by the CBSA” (form #s E608 and BSF237) subject to contract.

## Tender Information
### Publication Date
* The tender publication date is: August 2, 2023.
* All bid submissions must be received by September 13, 2023, at 14:00 EST.

### Contract Information
* The government contracting agency is: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
* The contracting agency address is: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

### Delivery Information
* Delivery will be made to the Canada Post – Mail processing unit, 2215 Gladwin Cr, Entrance C, Ottawa, Ontario.

### Service Description
The CBSA requires the supply of sealing tapes on an as-and-when-required basis. This Standing Offer is subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the Request for Standing Offer (RSO).

## Evaluation Criteria
* The selection will be based on the lowest price.

## Trade Agreements
This Standing Offer is open to suppliers under the following trade agreements:
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Additional Information
For more information, please contact Raphael Lafontaine, Contracting Officer, at raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

Note: The government has modified the close time for this tender. Please disregard the initial Ariba Discovery posting and Buyandsell postings. All bids must be submitted on September 6, 2023, by 14:00 EST. This change is effective and in effect immediately. Failure to comply with this modification may result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Please note that prior to the bid submission date of September 13, 2023, that the Postal Code Management of the CBSA must confirm the contractors’ postal address.
